full_text:
"Aquaman" film review: Great visuals and nice change of pace for the DCEU. Mostly a fun movie but there's some cheesy dialogue and poor music choices. Overall enjoyable if not a bit predictable. Oh, and Amber Heard in her costume... 😍🤤

7.5/10.
user.description: Save the girl, I've got this bitch.
user.name: Kevin Liu
proc_text: Aquaman film review Great visuals and nice change of pace for the DCEU Mostly a fun movie but there s some cheesy dialogue and poor music choices Overall enjoyable if not a bit predictable Oh and Amber Heard in her costume

full_text: This is a movie that has multiple scenes of giant fish monster armies. Jason Momoa and Amber Heard are both beautiful humans with great chemistry who are easy on the eyes. This movie is a win for DC and everybody who worked on and saw it. Five stars.

full_text:
Forgot to talk about Aquaman!

Mini movie review:

It’s veeery entertaining, super high commitment to the cheesy comic book feel, amazing soundtrack, great performances, tacky and cheesy lines. Amber Heard.

7/10. Really liked it.

full_text: Didn’t fall asleep in a DC movie- is the only accomplishment ..quite boring in most parts though, picks up pace only from the Sicily episode..too much VFX is over jarring..Mera Amber Heard is the sole reason to not fall asleep I guess😍..so much like black panther minus the feel

full_text: @smsaideman Sir, I will have to respectfully disagree wth you. Aquaman is by far the best comic book story to ever come to the screen. Its over the top battle scenes and sometimes horrible lines along with gorgeous scenes and people make it one of the best comic book movies ever. Amber Heard

full_text: Finally got to catch Aquaman. It was cool. A fun watch for sure. Wild corny at points lol but still an entertaining movie. Best part was getting to see Amber Heard look like the WHOLEST of jawns for 2+ hours though.

full_text:
#Aquaman was a great date night movie.

Jason Mamoa and Amber Heard have excellent chemistry.

Nice to see OGs like DeFoe, Dolph, Nicole Kidman getting that Comic Book Movie money!

Definitely worth the watch.

full_text:
Finally got round to seeing #Aquaman and really enjoyed it. Ridiculous & fun plot straight out of a comic book, stunning visual effects and Amber Heard 😍 what’s not to love? 

Best DCEU movie by far.
